title: Mandy, mum and Manu : a story of love, loss and union
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and daughters

abstract: 'She walked away from me, down the street and out of sight.'
description: When Mandy Finn Taylor first told her parents about her homosexuality, her mother wasn't ready to hear it. This reaction sparked a divide over the years between mother and daughter which eventually healed over time, with a little help from Manu.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002294; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (November 2008); Active; 2008
